title: KHR_materials_specular glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the strength of the specular reflection.

specularFactor.description: This parameter scales the amount of specular reflection on non-metallic surfaces. It has no effect on metals.
specularFactor.short_description: The strength of the specular reflection.

specularColorFactor.description: This is an additional RGB color parameter that tints the specular reflection of non-metallic surfaces. At grazing angles, the reflection still blends to white, and the parameter has not effect on metals. The value is linear.
specularColorFactor.short_description: The F0 RGB color of the specular reflection.

specularTexture.description: A 4-channel texture that defines the specular color in the RGB channels (encoded in sRGB) and the specular factor in the alpha channel. Will be multiplied by specularColorFactor and specularFactor.
specularTexture.short_description: A texture that defines the F0 color of the specular reflection and the specular factor.
